detail_desc: T-shirt in airy linen jersey with a round neckline and straight-cut hem.

Knee-length shorts in washed cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and straight legs. Large coin pocket, diagonal side pockets and back pockets. Hammer loop at the back of one leg and a double pocket at the back of the other leg.
Trousers in airy modal twill. Elasticated waist with a small frill trim, zip fly and button and patch front pockets. Loose, relaxed-fit legs with wide elastic at the hems.

Full-length, V-neck dress in heavily draping jersey with a slight sheen. Long shoulder straps that can be tied in various ways, elastication at the back of the waist and a raw-edge hem. Jersey lining.
Oval waist bag with a zip at the top and an adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener at the back. Lined. Size 5x13x19 cm.
Soft shoes in organic cotton with lacing at the front. Cotton jersey linings and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Wide blouse in a cotton and silk weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the front. Long, wide puff sleeves with cuffs, and short slits in the sides.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button and flared legs with raw-edge hems.

Sports bralette in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened together with a hook-and-eye at the back. Wide ribbed hem with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Extra firm support.

Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Decorative seams and concealed pockets at the front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Shirt in cotton twill with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist, button fly and raw-edge hems.

Blouse in a soft weave with broderie anglaise and hole-embroidered sections at the front and down the sleeves. Opening at the top and a wide, elasticated neckline with a decorative drawstring. Long, wide raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Longer at the back with a rounded hem.
Dressing gown in soft, patterned fleece with a hood, side pockets and tie belt at the waist.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a stand-up collar and cut-out section at the top, both front and back, with buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with flared, buttoned cuffs.
Calf-length, A-line dress in jersey crêpe with wide, frill-trimmed elasticated shoulder straps and a deep neckline at the back with covered elastication and horizontal ties. Lined.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some mohair.

Chimi x H&M. We have teamed up with Chimi Eyewear to create three updated versions of the brand’s iconic sunglasses. This style has a rectangular silhouette with flat lenses. The frames are made from high-quality cellulose acetate that is both BPA- and phthalate-free. The lenses have UV 400 filters for 100% UV-protection, and the sidepieces and front are connected with seven-barrel stainless steel hinges. Text print on the inside of one sidepiece. Supplied with a hard case, cleaning cloth and a drawstring bag. Available in three summery pastel shades as well as in stylish black. Total width 14.5 cm.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims.
Short, fitted one-shoulder dress in glittery jersey with one long sleeve.
Hi-tops with a padded edge, hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft cotton piqué with a collar and button placket.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with cuffs and a zip at the hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and gathered frills at the top.
Headband knitted in a soft wool blend with a twisted detail at the front.
Top in a soft cotton blend with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with decorative metal eyelets around the neckline and long sleeves.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Trousers with an elasticated waist.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with a regular, elasticated waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and ankle-length legs with creases.

Set with a cardigan, long-sleeved shirt and bow tie. Fine-knit cardigan with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and narrow, buttoned cuffs. Pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and small embroidered detail on the chest.
Calf-length skirt in an airy, patterned plumeti weave with an elasticated waist and flounced tiers to the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Jersey lining.
Trainers with lacing at the front, leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Wide shorts in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, ties at the front and patch front pockets.
Short-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend in various colours and designs.

Long dress in an airy weave with a shaped neckline, concealed zip at the back and gathered yoke front and back. Wide 3/4-length sleeves with flounces, and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Partly lined.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with side pockets and wide elastication with a drawstring at the waist. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.

Shirt in soft, brushed cotton twill with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fitted top in organic cotton soft jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
Leggings in extra sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Dress in a soft weave with a small stand-up collar, button placket and flounces at the top. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a softly draping, flared skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a round neck and decorative buttons down the front.
Fitted, knee-length skirt in sturdy jersey with a high waist. Concealed zip and a short slit at the back. Unlined.

3/4-length sports trousers in lightweight, fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with a mesh section at the back and ribbed hems. The trousers are made partly from recycled polyester.
Cardigan in printed marled jersey with a hood, zip down the front, side pockets and long sleeves.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with buttons down the front and a narrow rib trim around the neckline.

Short, wrapover dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, concealed press-stud at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with a wide flounce and sewn-on bow. Seam at the waist with a tie belt, a gently flared skirt and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft jersey.
Double-breasted coat in a felted wool blend with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Lined.
5-pocket skirt in washed denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button, and a frayed, raw-edge hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, smocking at the shoulders and short, wide sleeves. Narrow, frill-trimmed elasticated seam under the bust with ties. Lined at the top of the front.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and elasticated ribbing with a text print at the cuffs and hem.
Wide trousers in sturdy jersey with a high waist, zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and straight legs with inset panels for extra width.
Sweatshirt in a relaxed fit with long raglan sleeves, ribbed panels at the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a round neckline, and 3/4-length, open sleeves with ties at the cuffs.
Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Low crotch and tapered legs with gathered seams and a zip at the hems.

Sweatpants in soft slub sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch and pockets in the side seams. Tapered legs with trims down the sides and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Maxi dress in soft jersey with a V-neck at the front and low-cut neckline at the back. Wide shoulder straps that cross at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist and a long, pleated, heavily draping skirt. Lined.
Short top in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a zip in one side and wide lace trim at the hem.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in woven fabric with notch lapels and a wrapover front with a concealed button. Seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets, fake back pockets, and tapered, ankle-length leg with slits at the hems.
Halterneck bralette in lace with triangular cups with removable inserts, a wide hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Knee-length shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, side pockets and a back pocket.
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 2.5 cm.
Macramé waist belt made from cotton cord with a large, round metal buckle. Width approx. 4.5 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket and chest pocket. Short sleeves and short legs, both with sewn-in turn-ups, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Long jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and high slits in the sides. Longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with mesh details, a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage with gathered detailing at the back.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned fleece that fasten down the front and along one leg. Ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with appliqués on the front and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Set with a pair of adjustable, elastic braces and a pre-tied bow tie. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
Cotton jersey T-shirt with a raw-edge neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a chest pocket and rounded hem.
Body in ribbed jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves and concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Fully lined swimsuit with a deep, flounce-trimmed, elasticated V-neck front and back. Cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support and decorative crossover lacing at the front.
